fields.description:
h5. To reproduce
1. Run KS> Base UI> Views> Web Views> Image URL
h5. Actual result
 Image URL is not being loaded
It happens only on BB
h5. Expected result
Successfully loaded URL
fields.summary: KitchenSink: BlackBerry - Image URL - intermittently not loading

Closing ticket as BlackBerry is no longer supported by us.
